mapper.select: SELECT dict_id, name, description, group_id, status, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from dict_item WHERE group_id='menu_list' and status=1 order by sort asc

SELECT menu_id, name, description, url, icon, status, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, auth_id, @rownum:=@rownum+1 id from menu_info,(SELECT @rownum:=0) a WHERE auth_id in (SELECT auth_id from auth WHERE user_id = #{userId}) and parent_id=#{parentId} order by sort asc
